answers.answer: Im currently 38 weeks and 4 day now
Good question but I think it'll depend on your body.

I've been told by my midwife that preclampsia can only be cured by delivering baby. I think depending on how far gone you are they can monitor you but it ultimately the only way to get rid of it is to have your baby.
See im planning to do a vbac so im debating heavy on this but im doing whats best for my son
But if i end up doing a csection i'll be so relief cause im so tired and he is very healthy by now

I'm in the same situation I am currently being kept over night to moniter my blood pressure I have protein in my urine and swelling. I am only 33w I am freaking out.. I want my baby to be healthy I will also be doing a repeat c section if I do have him by tomorrow..
Blessedmommy209 your in my prayers love
Thanks you mimi your in my prayers as well..

question: So I have a little bit of preeclampsia I'm staying overnight at the hospital to be monitored and if it get worse I may end up doing a repeat csection Preeclampsia is when you have high blood pressure fever swelling high protein in urine blurry vision and some more stuff I forgot
title: will this go away i only have 10 days til i give birth
